name: the-phonebook-backend
description: exercises from part3 on the full-stack-open 2021 course.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../the-phonebook-frontend/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ../the-phonebook-backend/
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m "uibuild" && npm run deploy

author: Mauricio Ezequiel Benitez
